chapters.title: Chapter 16: Unexpected Absences
chapters.info: Salita Toranes, p. 331 (371)—Dark-skinned Sitter for the Yellow Ajah among the rebel Aes Sedai. She is from Tear, and is almost as dark as the Sea Folk. She was raised to a Sitter after the sisters banded together in Salidar. She suggested a tax on the towns the Aes Sedai passed through to raise money for the ever-growing army.
